alert.note: Alert for Annette Island; City and Borough of Wrangell; Ketchikan Gateway Borough; Petersburg Borough; Prince of Wales Island (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 25 at 4:59AM AKST until February 25 at 9:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: The surface low is tracking SE and inland over southern Baranof Island early Saturday morning. Periods of moderate snow continues on the NE and SE quadrants of the low, but has largely cleared on the west side with scattered snow showers. Snow continues to be dry and powdery. ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM AKST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of around one inch. * WHERE...Petersburg Borough, Prince of Wales Island, City and Borough of Wrangell, Ketchikan Gateway Borough and Annette Island. * WHEN...Until 9 AM AKST this morning. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates will begin to diminish Saturday morning. Reports of 4 to 6 inches were received as of late Friday night.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.

area.areaDesc: Annette Island; City and Borough of Wrangell; Ketchikan Gateway Borough; Petersburg Borough; Prince of Wales Island
